sources.name: source1
sources.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1

sinks.name: sink1
sinks.script:
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true) ~> sink1
